definition: late at night/in the dead of night
the still of the night (idiom)/late at night

sentences.english: Night decayed, a desk lamp, return yellow books depicting handwriting has light.
sentences.chinese: 夜闌珊，一盞檯燈下，返黃書箋筆跡已淡。

sentences.english: Beauty is heard. In the night.
In the stillness of the night we swam in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 夜闌人靜，我們在海里游泳。
